title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
Rescue the Grand Duke Type Quest Act 1 Location The Risen Road Reward The Sparky PointsThe JoltshooterThe Spellsparkler

Rescue the Grand Duke

Rescue the Grand Duke is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Rescue the Grand Duke can be acquired during Act 1. Completing Rescue the Grand Duke will progress the story forward.

Rescue the Grand Duke Objectives

Search for Survivors

We managed to get inside. We need to find the Grand Duke and fast.

Speak with Counsellor Florrick.

The woman we rescued surviv
